page.title: 10DOWTY BOULTON PAUL cont'd
page.content: The contract states that the land on which the factory is sited costs one pound per acre for ninety nine years.Dowty do not use the Shropshire Union canal anymore,it is actually an inconvenience.In a school survey we found that only three children have parents working at Dowty Boulton Paul.Dowty do not have many competitors but those they do have are very large.During the war Dowty Boulton Paul bred their own pigs,to be used for food in the canteen.They also built parts for the Defiant.Recently Dowty's have had three separate redundances. Everything is made by machine in the factory.Dowty Boulton Paul is important to the community because of the employment it offers to the residents of Bilbrook.
